MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: remove password, remove restrictions, pdf password, user password, owner password
English.Char_Desc_80: Remove PDF user password, owner password and restrictions.
English.Char_Desc_250: PDF Restrictions Remover is an efficient freeware, which allows you to remove user password, owner password and restrictions from PDF files.
English.Char_Desc_450: PDF Restrictions Remover is an efficient freeware, which allows you to remove user password, owner password and restrictions from PDF files. PDF Restrictions Remover can remove all PDF restrictions: printing, filling in a form, commenting in the document, managing pages and bookmarks, modifying document, content copying for accessibility, extracting the contents of the document and signing.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
PDF Restrictions Remover is an efficient freeware, which allows you to remove user password, owner password and restrictions from PDF files.
PDF Restrictions Remover removes PDF user password which encrypts the PDF file and prevents opening.
PDF Restrictions Remover removes PDF owner password which specifies operations that should be restricted even when the document is decrypted.
PDF Restrictions Remover can remove all PDF restrictions: printing, filling in a form, commenting in the document, managing pages and bookmarks, modifying document, content copying for accessibility, extracting the contents of the document and signing.
